subject: Instructions of telemetry mode
description_text:
Hello dear Simsonn team,

I've been using the Pro X Ultra pedals for a while and just noticed there
is an telemetry mode in the pedal light settings. I have set up the
settings but the lighting does not respond in the games. Do you have
instructions of how to enable telemetrics so the lighting works with the
telemetrics mode?

I have tried with beamng and automobilista 2

Kind regards,
Kenneth

conversations.body_text: Hi K H,  Automobilista 2 does support lighting telemetry. Could you please send me a screenshot of the “Lighting Telemetry” settings page in SIMSONN Manager (including the game selection, toggle status)? I’ll check whether everything is configured correctly.
